mapper.insert: INSERT INTO avatar(name, description, category, system_prompt, modelId, voice,create_time, update_time) VALUES(#{name}, #{description}, #{category}, #{systemPrompt},#{modelId}, voice,#{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE avatar SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, system_prompt = #{systemPrompt}, update_time = #{updateTime}, create_time = #{createTime}, modelId=#{modelId}, voice=#{voice} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, category, system_prompt, create_time, update_time, modelId, voice FROM avatar
